text: Hi! How are you today?
Good how is thee?
I am doing pretty well, thank you. Do you donate often?
I do not.
Would you be interested in hearing about save the children? maybe I can change your mind today
No I do not like children.
well I am sorry to hear that. But what if a child you help ends up growing up to save all the worlds problems?!
No, children are satans spawn.
But we need children to continue reproducing, or us as a species will perish
Wrong.  Children should at best be mass deployed to sweat shops to make sneakers I like.
Is there a charity that you do donate to?
Yes, if it involved subjecting children to extremely long hour work weeks, terrible work conditions, and hepatitis.
well i am sorry to hear you feel that way. Is it truly how you feel, or are you acting silly for this conversation
This is how I feel.  God made contraception for a reason.
How do you expect the world to continue growing?
In a single word, robots.  Robots are the answer.
What about donating to robot children of save the children?
If they were robot children, I stick to my earlier sentiment.  They should be rounded up and gently placed in a landfill.
well i am sorry I couldn't pursuade you today
Its fine, maybe youre a child?  I know of a local sweat shop that is hiring highly skilled child labor, any interest?
